name: json-deep-compare
description: A powerful library for comparing JSON objects with support for deep comparison, regex validation, and customizable options

scripts.test:formats: npm run build && node test/cjs-test.js && node --experimental-modules test/esm-test.mjs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:copy-package && npm run build:copy-types
scripts.build:full: npm run build && npm run test && npm run minify
scripts.build:copy-package: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const distPkg = { ...pkg }; distPkg.main = './cjs/index.js'; distPkg.module = './esm/index.js'; distPkg.exports = { '.': { 'import': './esm/index.js', 'require': './cjs/index.js' } }; distPkg.types = '../types/index.d.ts'; distPkg.files = ['LICENSE', 'README.md']; delete distPkg.devDependencies; delete distPkg.scripts; require('fs').writeFileSync('./dist/package.json', JSON.stringify(distPkg, null, 2));"
scripts.minify: for dir in cjs esm; do for file in dist/$dir/*.js dist/$dir/**/*.js; do if [ -f "$file" ]; then terser "$file" -c -m -o "$file"; fi; done; done
